text:
(Yegor initially applied in svn r815942)

Reverted in svn r816006

There are two problems with this patch:

Firstly, the patch introduces compiler errors.  They are probably not hard to fix, but it's much better if the patch applies cleanly.

Secondly, it is not clear how this change is useful because there is no test-case or example code supplied.  

Similar to the issues with bug 47848, can you supply an explanation of what you are trying to do?
creator: josh@apache.org

text: no response in a long time => resolving for now, please reopen with more information if this is still an issue
creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
